channel.title: 2. 类型检查 on Python 3
channel.description: Recent content in 2. 类型检查 on Python 3

item.title: 1. 内置类型
item.description: 1. 常见内置类型 https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html name: str = "Tom" # 字符串 age: int = 20 height: float = 1.75 male: bool = True scores: list = [90, 80, 85] # 列表 info: dict = {"name": "Tom", "age": 20} # 字典 z: complex = 1 + 2j # 复数
